title: Special Topics in Persian Studies; Arts, Leisure, and Entertainment: Urban Life in Modern Iran
description:
Also offered as HIST328C, JWST319I, and TDPS358B. Credit granted for PERS398B, HIST328C, JWST319I, or TDPS358B.

Interdisciplinary historical exploration of the formation and transformations of urban public culture in modern Iran. Taught in English.
